Title: Relates to a plan to address court calendar congestion upon the expiration of the eviction moratorium
Summary: Directs the chief administrator of the courts to develop a plan to address court calendar congestion upon the expiration of the eviction moratorium including additional temporary space for courts, additional hours, appointing additional judges to handle pending proceedings and coordination with OTDA.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to requiring the chief administrator of the courts to submit a report on a plan to respond to the end of the moratorium on evictions
